buttons.name: hello
buttons.response: Hello, how can I help you today?

buttons.name: research
buttons.response: Please allow me one to three minutes to research this issue.

buttons.name: completingRequest
buttons.response: Please allow me one to three minutes while I complete your request.

buttons.name: stillWorking
buttons.response: Thank you for your patience. I am currently addressing your concern.

buttons.name: stillResearching
buttons.response: Thank you for your patience. I am still researching your request.

buttons.name: idleWarning
buttons.response: I see you have been idle for more than one minute, is there anything else I can help you with?

buttons.name: idleDisconnect
buttons.response: We are always happy to help. Since you have been idle for more than two minutes I am disconnecting the chat. If there is anything else we can do for you, please initiate a new chat.

buttons.name: close
buttons.response: Thank you for allowing us to assist you!  Have a great day!
